name: YARM
title: YARM - Resource Monitor
author: Mithaldu (current maintainer)
description:
This mod helps you to keep track of your mining sites, with useful data such as the percent mined, and estimated time to depletion.

*** GUI_Unifyer is highly recommended to be installed with this mod. ***

Original author: Octav 'narc' Sandulescu, based on work by drs, jorgenRe, and L0771
